TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPphManager

Docs.summary: Provides stop and start control of listener channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IPphManager> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

Docs.summary: Starts the specified process protocol listener channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IPphManager.StartProcessProtocolListenerChannel%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

MemberSignature.Value: public void StopProcessProtocol (string protocolId, bool immediate);

Public Sub StopProcessProtocol (protocolId As String, immediate As Boolean)
public: void StopProcessProtocol(System::String ^ protocolId, bool immediate);
abstract member StopProcessProtocol : string * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The protocol ID of the listener channel to stop.
to notify the process protocol manager to stop all listener channels synchronously; to stop all listener channels asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IPphManager.StopProcessProtocol%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

abstract member StopProcessProtocolListenerChannel : string * int * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The protocol ID for the listener channel.
to notify the process protocol manager to stop all listener channels synchronously; to stop all listener channels asynchronously.
Docs.summary: Stops the specified process protocol listener channel.
